txt.en: 'Hello, traveller. May I ask a favour of you? I am worried about a young man named Randgar, who lives on a farm outside of Cliving. I have heard countless stories of crofters coming under siege from fearsome Orcs and other beasts, and I pray that Randgar remains yet safe.\n\n'I care deeply for Randgar, but my father will not allow me to see him. He knows that Randgar is poor and believes he is unworthy of our concern. Please, visit his farm and ensure his safety. I love Randgar, but I would rather he flee to Edoras than come to harm for my sake.'

'My dear Inhild... she need not worry for me. Since I first gazed upon her in the market, I have been in love, and I will do anything to be near her. I refuse to leave for Edoras, for we may never meet again.\n\n'I appreciate your concerns, but I will not leave without seeing Inhild.'
Inhild is worried about a young farmer named Randgar, whom she cares deeply for. Randgar has decided to risk his life outside of Cliving, rather than abandon the woman he loves.
Talk to Randgar at his farm
Randgar lives on a small farm, south and east of Cliving, along the road.\n\nInhild has asked you to go to the farmer Randgar and convince him to flee for her sake.
